title: BugSplat Error - Please Help - its been 4 days.
body:
Hi guys,

I've already tried all the bug splat error fix guides that Riot recommends, along with uninstalling and re-installing the game. I already opened up a ticket with
Riot and still haven't heard back from them. One clue to this is that I started having this problem after the new champion Kled joined the gang.

Let me know what I can do to fix this.

Thanks,

-E

replies.body:
UPDATE!!!!! AND FIX 

So I found out what is wrong with the game and why it keeps crashing. It has to do with the resolution that your computer is running. The screen resolution does not match up with the resolution of the game configurations.  I will tell you how to fix that.

1.	Go to your Riot games folder. 
2.	Open the Config folder
3.	Open game.cfg file with notepad. 
4.	Under [GENERAL] change the 
Height=
Width= 
To the resolution of your monitor or screen.  Mine was set to 900 and 1440, and I am using a 1024 and 1280 monitor. 
5.	Start the game. It will work.

Hey I think I have a fix!
1. Uninstall your league from Control panel. 
2. download CCleaner https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download. Install CCleaner.
3. Run CCleaner and Click Registry on the Left where the gray is in the CCleaner program. 
4. Hit scan
5. After it scans, hit Fix all. And then a little window will come up. select Fix all. 
6. restart your computer. 
7. Download the LOL installer
8. start the installer.
9. The installer will finish, but there may be another window that comes up saying to install .Net Framework 3.5. You need to install this. 
10. After it install the .NET framework restart the computer. 
11. After booting, run LOL client. It should start patching. 
12. After patching is complete, it should run the game. Try a custom game. It worked for me.
ALSO, when the game is patching, go the to settings and UNCHECK Allow peer ro peer, this will boost you download speed. Hopefully this works. 
I am running window 10 64 bit. OS Build 14393.51. intel core i5 HD graphics 4600

Yes, after champion select and when the timer hits 0, it briefly goes into the loading screen and then it crashes. 

I received an email back from them saying my summoner name was inappropriate- which is completely off topic and did not proceed to help me at all.

Since you've already put in a support ticket, I recommend remaining patient while a tech specialist gets back to you. They have the skills necessary to resolve this issue for good. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
